articles.title: Stillwater: Matt Damon goes full MAGA in drama that might just get him an Oscar - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: REVIEW: Hollywood hasn't had much time or empathy for the illiberal, white American male recently, but this might help to balance the ledger a little.
articles.content:
Stillwater (M, 139 mins) Directed by Tom McCarthy ***½
 In the French city of Marseilles, a young American woman languishes in prison. 
 She has been convicted of murder, even though the evidence a… [+3363 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Uber Launches Service With Taxi Drivers in Colombia - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Uber will offer access to its platform to regular taxi drivers in Colombia, replicating a move it has already rolled out in other countries in Latin America and Europe since last year.
articles.content: Ride-hailing app Uber will offer access to its platform to regular taxi drivers in Colombia, it said on Wednesday, replicating a move it has already rolled out in other countries in Latin America and… [+1820 chars]
